titles: The pathe of obedience, compiled by Iames Cancellar, one of the Quenes Maiesties moste honourable chapell
author: Cancellar, James,
publisher: By Iohn Wailande, at the signe of the Sun in Fletestrete ouer agaynste the Conduit,
notes: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio per septennium.
Imperfect; B5 and all after E3 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
